query:
SELECT a.id, a.assetId, a.condition, a.estimatedRepairCost, a.componentCode, a.componentName
FROM assessments a
JOIN assets ast ON a.assetId = ast.id
WHERE ast.projectId = 12
LIMIT 20
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2g8chP3aro94bni.root --database XnmtZZwX6e46H8JVZbq4Ta --execute SELECT a.id, a.assetId, a.condition, a.estimatedRepairCost, a.componentCode, a.componentName
FROM assessments a
JOIN assets ast ON a.assetId = ast.id
WHERE ast.projectId = 12
LIMIT 20
logs: ERROR 1054 (42S22) at line 1: Unknown column 'a.condition' in 'field list'
